Articles.Content:
Well boys, the objective of this challenge is to fly a small ship, with just enough fuel to land on the Mun, to land on the Mun, then, you take a large ship with a claw (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12633.msg197146;boardseen#new), to pick it up and take it to Minmus, where the large ship will then return to Kerbin. Pretty simple, right? Until you realize that this is a VANILLA challenge, which means NO mods or addons, NO custom parts. Anyways, I still havent figured out how to do this, but I\'m sure the KSP community will! If you complete/attempt it, please take screenshots of your journey and post them here!

Thanks,

~Lazer
Did ya try it yet? Sorry, I still haven\'t attempted it... O___o

Did ya try it yet? Sorry, I still haven\'t attempted it... O___o

Yes, many explosions.
